title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 124.4 - Review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 124.4 - Review

State Regulations

The period of time within which the petitioner may make
application for review of the Comptroller's determination pursuant to article
78 of the Civil Practice Law and Rules shall begin to run five days after the
mailing of such determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
124.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
